alert.note: Alert for Logan (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 3:25PM MDT until July 05 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Logan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 325 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Fleming, or 15 miles northeast of Sterling, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Iliff around 335 PM MDT. Proctor around 345 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Crook. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
